subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Giants’ rookie Mathias Kiwanuka, a 23-year-old son of Ugandan immigrants with an honored surname, plans to go to Uganda this offseason to help connect his emerging reputation to that of his famous grandfather.
snippet: Giants’ rookie Mathias Kiwanuka, a 23-year-old son of Ugandan immigrants with an honored surname, plans to go to Uganda this offseason to help connect his emerging reputation to that of his famous grandfather.
